description: TimesCast: Storm recovery efforts continued in New York City and beyond on Thursday, and Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg endorsed President Obama, citing climate change.
title: Bloomberg’s Endorsement; Recovery Update
title_page: Bloomberg’s Endorsement; Recovery Update - Video - NYTimes.com
text: TimesCast: Storm recovery efforts continued in New York City and beyond on Thursday, and Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg endorsed President Obama, citing climate change.
